properties.name: fileRepo.system.fileId.length
properties.description: The length of the file ID for the BricsFile object.'

properties.name: fileRepo.taskExecutor.pool.size.core
properties.description: The number of core task execution pools.

properties.name: fileRepo.taskExecutor.pool.size.max
properties.description: The maximum number of task execution pools.

properties.name: fileRepo.taskExecutor.queue.capacity
properties.description: The maximum number of tasks that can occupy each pool.

properties.name: fileRepo.taskExecutor.timeout.milliseconds
properties.description: The timeout (in milliseconds) for waiting for a task to be added to the pool.
